param-doc.name: tokenLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer that contains tokens.

param-doc.name: sentenceLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer that contains sentence annotations.

param-doc.name: posFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature containing the POS-tag.

param-doc.name: dependencyLabelFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the dependency label.

param-doc.name: namedEntityLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing the named entities.

param-doc.name: namedEntityTypeFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature to access the type of the named entities.

param-doc.name: schema
param-doc.p:
Give the schema of the relations to train i.e.
Bacteria,Location

param-doc.name: python2Executable
param-doc.p: Path to the Python 2 executable, TEES will fail if run through Python 3.

param-doc.name: teesHome
param-doc.p: Path to the TEES home directory.

param-doc.name: steps
param-doc.p: Set the preprocessing steps in the form of [LOAD][,GENIA_SPLITTER][,BANNER][,BLLIP_BIO][,STANFORD_CONVERT][,SPLIT_NAMES][,FIND_HEADS][,SAVE]

param-doc.name: omitSteps
param-doc.p: Set the preprocessing steps to ignore in the form of [GENIA_SPLITTER][,BANNER][,BLLIP_BIO][,STANFORD_CONVERT][,SPLIT_NAMES][,FIND_HEADS]

param-doc.name: detector
param-doc.p: Set the detector to use (ie., Detectors.EdgeDetector or Detectors.Eventdetector). By default, Detectors.Edgedetector is used
